entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
